root.name: Puzz 3D: The Orient Express
root.description: Overview Puzz 3D: The Orient Express is a jigsaw puzzle game developed by DYAD Digital Studios and published by Wrebbit for both the PC and Mac in 2000. Gameplay Puzz 3D: The Orient Express is a jigsaw puzzle game where the object is to put together the puzzle. The puzzles can be completed in either 2D or in 3D.
